about_the_game:
This product can be used during Season 3 in "Darksword".

When you start the game, you can obtain items from the MULTIPLAYER (Lobby).

By playing multiplayer and earning season points, you can obtain various items and gold for player growth.

- Premium Battle Pass Season 3 is valid while Season 3 is in progress.

- If you purchase a premium battle pass, you can get much better rewards than free items.

Please use this content after updating to the latest version.
